page.title: 07Trade
page.content: Most of the{shops}in our area consist of small family businesses where the shopkeeper lives on the premises.We have many small, independent bakers with shops that still make traditional fayre and the smell of hot bread wafts down the high street.We have only one self-service shop,a mini supermarket,selling{food ,several butchers' shops,a hardware and D.I.Y. centre,and the usual assortment of grocer and vegetable merchants. The newest{business}to open is a "Video" shop.This caters for the latest craze in family{entertainment of watching films on TV.A feature film can be hired for Â£1.25 per day.A census of our class showed that over half regularly watch hired films on TV.
